REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1721 reute r f BC-HOMESTEAD-<HFL>-BEGIN 04-01 0051

TEXT.TITLE: HOMESTEAD <HFL> BEGINS PUBLIC SHARE OFFERING
TEXT.BODY: Homestead Financial Corp said it began a public offering of 3,500,000 shares of its class A common at 10.875 dlrs per share, through an underwriting group managed by Drexel Burnham Lambert Inc and Merrill Lynch Capital Markets. Reuter
